author: USA TODAY, Mary Cadden, USA TODAY
title: Jimmy Fallon, Betty White and more celebs read books to kids with online story time
description: Working from home and the kids need a story? Actors, comics and authors including Jimmy Fallon and Betty White are here to help
content:
Josh Gad of 'Frozen' is hosting online story time for kids stuck at home during the coronavirus outbreak.
USA TODAY
Because of coronavirus, many parents are working from home and most schools are closed for the foreseeable future. With families sequestered … [+3252 chars]
